zyu19.libs.action.chain.config

Interface ChainStyle<ThisType extends ChainStyle<?>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractActionChain, ActionChain

    public interface ChainStyle<ThisType extends ChainStyle<?>>
    This interface restricts ActionChain to avoid callback hell, and to enable the users of this library to choose a thread for every "action" (or 'PureAction' object).

    Although this looks like Promise, it does NOT follow the standard of Promise-Then.

    Created on 7/24/2015.

    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Zhongzhi Yu

    • Method Summary

      <In,Out> ThisType uiThen(PureAction<In,Out> action)

    • Method Detail

      • start

        ReadOnlyChain start(Consumer<?> onSuccess)
        Start running the 'PureAction' objects in ChainStyle.

        Your actions will be copied to another object so that you can call clear() immediately after start().

        Parameters:
        onSuccess - if not null, it will be called after all actions finish without Exception.
        Returns:
        an Object representing the sequence of PureAction you created. Usually this object is useless but if you return this object inside another PureAction, then that PureAction will wait for this chain of actions to finish before it can finish.

      • clear

        ThisType clear(Consumer<ErrorHolder> onFailure)
        Clear all actions. You can call this function after start() so as to arrange a new sequence of actions.
        Parameters:
        onFailure - the new onFailure callback for actions added afterwards. It can also be set to null.
        Returns:
        this object, thus enabling method chaining.

      • fail

        ThisType fail(Consumer<ErrorHolder> onFailure)
        set the onFailure callback for 'PureAction' objects added subsequently
        Parameters:
        onFailure - a callback to be invoked when any Exception is thrown from "actions" (or 'PureAction' objects).
        Returns:
        this object, thus enabling method chaining.

      • then

        <In,Out> ThisType then(boolean runOnWorkerThread,
                       PureAction<In,Out> action)
        Add a 'PureAction' object, or an "action", in this ChainStyle.
        Type Parameters:
        In - The input type of this action. Retrolambda will want to set this template parameter.
        Out - The output type of this action. Retrolambda will want to set this template parameter.
        Parameters:
        runOnWorkerThread - if set to false, the action will run on the main thread (UI thread) specified by ThreadChanger. Otherwise the task will run on any other thread (worker thread).
        action - the PureAction to be added.
        Returns:
        this object, thus enabling method chaining.

      • netThen

        <In,Out> ThisType netThen(PureAction<In,Out> action)
        Add a 'PureAction' object, or an "action", in this ChainStyle on the worker thread.
        Type Parameters:
        In - The input type of this action. Retrolambda will want to set this template parameter.
        Out - The output type of this action. Retrolambda will want to set this template parameter.
        Parameters:
        action - the PureAction to be added.
        Returns:
        this object, thus enabling method chaining.

      • uiThen

        <In,Out> ThisType uiThen(PureAction<In,Out> action)
        Add a 'PureAction' object, or an "action", in this ChainStyle on the main (UI) thread.
        Type Parameters:
        In - The input type of this action. Retrolambda will want to set this template parameter.
        Out - The output type of this action. Retrolambda will want to set this template parameter.
        Parameters:
        action - the PureAction to be added.
        Returns:
        this object, thus enabling method chaining.
